changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `request_log` ( `id` bigint(12) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键id', `api_config_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '接口配置id', `interface_name` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci COMMENT '接口名称', `interface_type` varchar(256) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT '' COMMENT '接口类型', `process_result` varchar(256) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT '' COMMENT '处理结果', `process_time` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '处理时间', `creation_date` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `request` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci COMMENT '请求request', `response` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci COMMENT '返回response', `error_msg` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci COMMENT '错误代码', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='接口调用日记表';
